page.title: 12Fishing-Caravans-Boating
page.content: There are many forms of recreation and sport to be found in the area.On the canal there are both motor-boat cruising and canoeing.Both coarse, and game fishing take place in the area.On the A6 there are time trials for cyclists and cycle touring both on the A6 and in and around Scorton. Caravanning is found in Scorton where there is a large static and touring site and the occasional field by the A6 is also used for touring caravans.Scorton is particularly well served for sporting activities with tennis courts, bowling green, a football field and facilities for dancing and badminton in the Public Hall.
